name: Jonathan's Whale
description:
This game was created in 3 days by 3 people as a #ue4jam submission in summer 2018.

"Jonathan´s Whale" is a short, abstract adventure game. In a grey and bitter world, an old man regrets what he has once done to a whale many years ago. But one day life changes for both individuals. This is the story of Jonathan and his whale.

Controls:

WASD- Move

E - Interact

Scroll Up/Down - Increase/Decrease casting distance of fishing rod

Credits:

Steve Chapman - Development, Level Design, Concept

David Jungnickel - Asset Creation, Concept, theatres music

Lukas Zepf - Composition, Sound Design
